about_the_game:
Explore new locations, recruit elite elf troops and find a wizard who got lost hundreds of years ago..

Add-on to the game "The Rings of Powder" containing:

- 3 new heroes -

- Wizard Raeggedust, ( he really likes animals.. preferably baked or boiled.. )
- Elf Prince Beauhairendel, ( he fights for a long & shiny hair )
- Ilmares.

- 11 new units -

- Banshee,
- Smilodon Rider,
- Smilodon,
- Fire spider,
- Boss fire spider "Hungry Flame",
- Elf Elites,
- Fallen Spirit of the Wild,
- Green Dragon,
- Golem,
- Trail Runners,
- Earth Elemental

- 13 new locations -

- Smilodon Cave,
- Smilodon Enclousure,
- Misty Swamps,
- Forgotten Corridor,
- Chamber of Treasures,
- The Forgotten Temple,
- The Wizard's Basement,
- Domain of the Elves
- A Nest Of Fire Spiders
- Machinarium,
- Smuggling Conglomerate,
- Master Blacksmith's Forge,
- Nest of Hungry Flame

Due to the fact that one of our new heroes likes animals, preferably baked or boiled, the product is not recommended for vegans.
If you are vegan, consult a doctor or psychologist before this DLC installation. ( or after )

The project is intended to be ironic and is not intended to offend anyone, but only to create bright characters that will bring a smile to your face.

We respect absolutely everyone regardless of whether they are Megan, Vegan or Pagan.

No animals were harmed in the production of this DLC. (except for the mosquitoes that attacked us in the evenings).

short_description: The "The weird world of the Elves" expansion introduces three new heroes, three new scenarios/challenges and expands the game with new locations and monsters, giving it a more epic size.
